metadata.title: Eventstage – Your Event Platform
metadata.description: Discover, join, and manage amazing events with Eventstage. Track schedules, buy tickets, and connect with organizers and attendees.
metadata.ogDescription: Discover, join, and manage amazing events with Eventstage.
metadata.twitterDescription: Discover, join, and manage amazing events with Eventstage.

hero.title: Join and create events with ease
hero.description: Our platform allows you to create, invite friends, and join events for free. Get started now and become part of the community.

features_section.title: Features
features_section.description: Our platform offers everything you need to manage and participate in events easily.

create_events.title: Create Events
create_events.description: Create custom events with detailed descriptions, dates, URL, and more.

find_events.title: Find Events
find_events.description: Search and filter events by categories to find what you're looking for.

invite_friends.title: Invite Friends
invite_friends.description: Invite friends to your events and track who has signed up.

ranking.title: Invite Ranking
ranking.description: See who invited the most people and earn recognition through our ranking system.

free.title: Totally Free
free.description: Create and join events completely free, with no hidden costs or subscriptions.

how_it_works_section.title: How It Works
how_it_works_section.description: Start using our platform in a few simple steps

step1.title: Create your account
step1.description: Register quickly and securely to start exploring.

step2.title: Create or Join
step2.description: Create your own event or join events created by other users.

step3.title: Share and Invite
step3.description: Invite your friends to events and increase your ranking position.

cta.title: Ready to get started?
cta.description: Create your account for free and start organizing your events today. Don't waste time!

footer.description: A platform to create and join events for free.
